text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Due to scheduled track maintenance,<n>I planned on starting
training earlier<n>than usual... or so I thought.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: One! Two! Three!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant... It still feels like I'mnot hitting that last turn well. Oncemore, then...
choice_data_list: Hey, it's almost time for training though...
Hey, it's almost time for training though...

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Ugh, I know, I know. Don't be so<n>impatient. No one likes
being rushed.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Just let me focus for a bit longer. I<n>stumbled in the middle of
my last<n>winning concert...

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Oh, you didn't see it? Well then, my<n>recovery must've been
perfect.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
But it doesn't matter if people noticed<n>or not—a failure's a
failure. I won't<n>allow myself to make the same<n>mistake
twice.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: That's what it means to be first-rate.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
So please, let me go through it one<n>more time. It's fine if we
push training<n>a bit later.
choice_data_list: Fine, but just once more, okay?
Fine, but just once more, okay?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Indeed. Once more until I'm satisfied<n>with my performance.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Hm? Did I stutter? I don't think so.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Ohohoho! Did you really think I would<n>leave a flaw as-is? I
won't move on<n>until it's perfect!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
I'll give you the honor of starting the<n>music. Together, we
will push my<n>dancing skills to the highest level!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Okay, let's start training. Are you<n>ready?
choice_data_list: There's not much time left though...

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: What do you mean? Gosh, we're<n>fine. Relax a little bit.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Besides, I know the schedule for this<n>course. I'm positive
we've got ample<n>time to spare.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Anyway, that's enough talk for now!<n>Hurry up and get
ready for practice<n>already!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
...It's my policy to always give it my<n>all, whether it's
dancing or training.<n>Everything must be perfect—

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Ding dong...

text_block_list.name: School Announcer
text_block_list.text:
Training time has ended. The course<n>will now undergo
scheduled<n>maintenance. Students, please collect<n>your
belongings and exit quickly.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Gasp.
choice_data_list: Did you forget about the maintenance?
Did you forget about the maintenance?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Ngh... A-as if I'd forget something so<n>crucial! And besides,
it's not like I<n>have to practice at school. I can go<n>run
somewhere else.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Hmph, you can leave. Training alone<n>isn't a big deal
anyway. I'll be fine by<n>myself!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: All right, shoo—

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
But I'm sure you have other things<n>on your to-do list today.
You don't<n>have to come with—
choice_data_list: As your trainer, you're my top priority.
As your trainer, you're my top priority.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
W-well, you better get ready to stay<n>for hours and hours
because I'm<n>going to keep running until I'm<n>satisfied!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Ohohoho! That's the energy I'm<n>looking for! I hope you're
prepared!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As the sun slips underneath the<n>horizon, I keep King Halo
company<n>while she trains to her heart's<n>content.
